name: Adamantium
effect: Teammate may attack the Reserve with Power cards for remainder of game.

name: Age of Apocalypse - Historical Twist
effect:
Age of Apocalypse's team may rearrange all Hits in the Permanent Records of all Front Line Characters.
One per deck.

name: Alpha Flight - Vindicator
effect: Acts as a level 5 Strength or Intellect attack. May not be defended by a card from a Battlesite.

name: Amos Fred Duncan
effect: Teammate must play 1 Special card.

name: Angel - Neuro-Toxin
effect: Acts as a level 6 Energy attack. If successful, Opponent is -4 to Venture.

name: Any Character - Devourer of Worlds
effect:
Play during battle. Opponent cannot use Activator cards for remainder of game or until this Special has been attacked with 4 Activator card attacks. This Special may not be negated.
One per deck.

name: Any Homebase - A-Next
effect:
Acts as a level 4 Strength attack. Any Front Line Character may make 1 additional attack.
One per deck.

name: Asteroid M - Orbital Hideout
effect:
For remainder of game, Asteroid M's team may draw 1 card from top of Draw Pile immediately after blocking an attack using a Fighting Power card. Discard if duplicate.
One per deck.

name: Avalon - Mutant Refuge
effect:
For remainder of game, both players must draw 1 card from top of Draw Pile for each Activator card played by Opponent. Draw card before resolving Opponent's action. Discard duplicates.
One per deck.

name: Bastion
effect:
May play any "Sentinels" Special cards.
Attacks made with Intellect Power cards may not be moved or shifted from Target Character.

name: Callisto
effect:
May play any "Morlocks" Special cards.
May play "Caliban" from Reserve.

name: Cape Citadel
effect:
Chars: Crux, Grey King, Landslide, Mercury, Rapture, Xaos

Ability: During discard phase, after discarding 1 or more duplicate or unusable cards, sort through Power Pack and draw any 1 card. May not be duplicate.

name: Cape Citadel - The Benassi Rocket
effect:
Acts as a level 7 Any-Power attack. If successful, Opponent must discard all Special cards and Activator cards in Hand.
One per deck.

name: Captain Britain - Battleworthy
effect: Opponent must immediately discard all Special cards in play that affect the "remainder of the battle" or the "remainder of the game.".

name: Captain Britain - Physics Genius
effect: Captain Britain's team's Basic Universe cards used to attack count toward Damage and Venture Total for remainder of game.

name: Captain Britain - Prodigious Strength
effect: Acts as a level 5 Fighting attack. If successful, Target Character loses Inherent Ability and is considered to have no Inherent Ability for remainder of battle.

name: Captain Britain - Super Endurance
effect:
For remainder of game, cards on Captain Britain's Hits to Current Battle with Energy or Fighting icons do not count towards Opponent's Venture Total.
One per deck.

name: Captain Britain - Supersonic
effect:
Acts as a level 9 Energy or Strength attack.
One per deck.

name: Cerebro - Catalogue
effect: Acts as a level 5 Fighting attack. If successful, Opponent must discard all Activator cards from Hand.

name: Cerebro - Computer Origin
effect:
For remainder of battle, if Cerebro can block a Power card attack with an equal value Power card, Cerebro's Power card hits attacker.
One per deck.

name: Cerebro - Mutant Seeker
effect: Acts as a level 2 Intellect attack. If successful, attacks made on Target Character may not be moved to any of Target's teammates for remainder of game.

name: Cerebro - Sentinel Evolution
effect: Opponent may not play any Aspect cards for remainder of battle.

name: Cerebro - The Founder
effect: Cerebro may Place and play Professor X's "Cerebro," "Psychic Shield," and "X-Men Founder" Special cards for remainder of game.

name: Chief Authier
effect: Teammate must play 1 Special card.

name: Colossus Age of Apocalypse
effect: Attacks made with Strength Power cards may not be moved or shifted from Target Character.

name: Crux
effect: Crux may avoid any attack with a level 1 Intellect Power card.

name: Crux - Coldforce
effect: Acts as a level 4 Energy or Strength attack. May make 1 additional attack.

name: Crux - Heatforce
effect: Acts as a level 4 Fighting or Intellect attack. May make 1 additional attack.

name: Crux - Payback
effect:
Play when Opponent concedes battle. Opponent may not concede battle.
One per deck.

name: Crux - Precision Agility
effect: Acts as a level 2 Energy attack. If successful, attacks made on Target Character may not be moved to any of Target's teammates for remainder of game.

name: Crux - Thermodynamics
effect: Acts as a level 0 Strength attack. May only be defended using a Power card with a Value of 5 or greater.

name: Dazzler - Pinpoint Laser
effect: Acts as a level 4 Strength or Energy attack. Attack is not affected by Special cards already in play.

name: Deathbird
effect:
May play any "Shi'ar" Special cards.
May defend Front Line with Power cards from Reserve.

name: Department H - Secret Directive
effect:
Department H's team's successful Hits made with Power cards are +1 to Venture total for remainder of game.
One per deck.

name: Donald Pierce
effect: May play any "Reavers" Special cards.

name: Fall's Edge Compound - Quarantine
effect: Acts as a level 6 Energy attack. If successful, Target Character must discard all Placed cards and move into Reserve for remainder of battle.

name: Goblyn Queen
effect: Attacks made with Energy Power cards may not be moved or shifted from Target Character.

name: Goblyn Queen - Clonal Origin
effect: Goblyn Queen may Place and play Jean Grey's "Phoenix Effect," "Mental Deflection," and "Mind Over Matter" Special cards for remainder of game.

name: Goblyn Queen - Dark Magic
effect: Acts as a level 5 Energy attack. If successful, Target Character loses Inherent Ability and is considered to have no Inherent Ability for remainder of battle.

name: Goblyn Queen - Goblyn Armada
effect: Opponent may not play any Special cards that affect "the remainder of the battle" or the "remainder of the game" for the remainder of the battle.

name: Goblyn Queen - Inferno
effect:
Acts as a level 6 Any-Power attack. If successful, Target Character is KO'd by next level 2 Energy Power card Hit, regardless of Inherent Abilities and other Special cards.
One per deck.

name: Goblyn Queen - Phoenix Lifeforce
effect:
Play during battle. On your turn, after Goblyn Queen is KO'd, discard this Special to move Goblyn Queen from Defeated Characters Pile to Reserve. Play as normal.
One per deck.

name: Grey King - Analytical Genius
effect: Play in current battle. Next battle, neither player may Venture more than 2 Mission cards.

name: Grey King - Carrier Wave
effect: Avoid 1 attack.

name: Grey King - Leader
effect: Grey King may increase either his team's or Opponent's Ventured Mission cards by 1.

name: Grey King - Psychic Neutralizer
effect: Acts as a level 5 Intellect attack. If successful, Target Character loses Inherent Ability and is considered to have no Inherent Ability for remainder of battle.

name: Grey King - Tk Beam
effect:
Acts as a level 8 Intellect attack, +1 for each Hit on Grey King's Permanent Record.
One per deck.

name: Havok - Mutant X
effect: Acts as a level 3 Intellect attack. If successful, Havok may immediately draw 2 cards from top of Draw Pile. Discard if duplicate.

name: Havok Mutant X
effect: Team +3 to Venture Total when a teammate is KO'd.

name: Iceman The Ice-Man
effect: +1 to Venture Total for each Hit in Iceman: The Ice-Man's Hits to Current Battle.

name: Image Inducer
effect: Teammate may discard 2 cards from top of Draw Pile to Dead Pile to move any attack made on any Front Line Character onto Character with Image Inducer. Character may defend.

name: Krakoa
effect:
Chars: Sunfire, Thunderbird, Angel, Polaris, Colossus, Wolverine

Ability: Krakoa Team's Energy Power cards are +1 to attack.

name: Krakoa - The Living Island
effect: Attack made on any of Krakoa's Front Line Characters is now made on Krakoa. Krakoa may not defend or be KO'd. Hit counts toward Venture Total.

name: Landau, Luckman, and Lake
effect:
Chars: Wolverine, Deadpool, Venom, Expediter, Psylocke, Captain America

Ability: Landau, Luckman, and Lake Team's MultiPower Power cards are +1 to attack.

name: Landau, Luckman, and Lake - Warp Chamber
effect:
Remove all Hits from any of Landau, Luckman, and Lake's Front Line Character's Permanent Record and Current Battle, and switch Places with the Landau, Luckman, and Lake's Reserve.
One per deck.

name: Landslide
effect: Opponent is -3 to Venture Total when Landslide's teammate is KO'd.

name: Landslide - Appetite for Destruction
effect: Play during battle. For remainder of battle, any Special card played must be a Special card that acts as an attack. Other Special cards may not be played.

name: Landslide - Big Bully
effect: Acts as a level 5 Fighting attack. If successful, Target Character may not play Activator cards for remainder of battle.

name: Landslide - Massive Speed
effect: Acts as a level 5 Energy or Strength attack. May not be defended by a card from a Battlesite.

name: Landslide - Short Fuse
effect:
Landslide may make as many Power card attacks as possible. Opponent may defend.
One per deck.

name: Landslide - Wallop
effect: Acts as a level 0 Intellect attack. May only be defended using a Power card with a Value of 5 or greater.

name: Lila Cheney
effect: Teammate must play 1 Special card.

name: M'Krann Fragment
effect: Teammate may discard 2 cards from top of Draw Pile to Dead Pile after placing Phase, before Venture Phase, each battle to Venture 3 Mission cards with no penalty that battle.

name: Madripoor - Underworld Center
effect: Play during battle on any of Madripoor's Front Line Characters. At end of battle, no Hits are added to Character's Permanent Record. Discard at end of battle. Does not affect Venture total.

name: Maggot - Intestinal Fortitude
effect:
Acts as a level 7 Strength attack. If successful, Opponent must sort through Draw Pile and discard first 3 Special cards into Dead Pile. Reshuffle Draw Pile.
One per deck.

name: Marrow - Battlebones
effect: Acts as a level 3 Strength attack. If attack is defended, Marrow may draw 1 card from top of Draw Pile. Discard duplicates.

name: Marvel Manhattan - Excelsior
effect: Each player is -3 to Venture Total for each Special card in play at the end of battle.

name: Marvel Universe - Excelsior
effect: Each player is -3 to Venture Total for each Special card in play at the end of battle.

name: Maverick - Combat Armor
effect: Acts as a level 5 Fighting or Intellect attack. May not be defended by a card from a Battlesite.

name: Maverick - Freelance Spy
effect:
Team gains +2 to all actions.
One per deck.

name: Maverick - Kinetic Absorption
effect: Avoid 1 attack made with a Power card. Maverick may draw 1 card from the top of the Draw Pile. Discard duplicates.

name: Maverick - Legacy Regression
effect: Maverick is not affected by Event cards for remainder of game.

name: Maverick - Power Channel
effect: Remove 1 Hit from Maverick's Hits to Current Battle. Maverick may make 1 attack with any card, usable by Maverick and in Hand, of equal or less Value than removed Hit.

name: Mercury - Combat Experience
effect: Opponent must immediately discard all Special cards in play that affect the "remainder of the battle" or the "remainder of the game".

name: Mercury - Mercenary Code
effect: Acts as a level 6 Intellect attack. If successful, Opponent must discard from Hand until both players have an equal number of cards in Hand. Opponent's choice.

name: Mercury - Mercuric Blades
effect: Acts as a level 5 Fighting attack. May make 1 additional Fighting attack.

name: Mercury - Metallic Control
effect: Avoid 1 attack made with an Aspect card.

name: Mercury - Soldier-of-Fortune
effect:
Sort through Draw Pile card by card. Remove first card with an attack Value. Add Value to Mercury's Venture Total for current battle. Reshuffle Draw Pile.
One per deck.

name: Mojoworld - TV Dimension
effect:
For remainder of game, Mojoworld's team may draw 1 card from top of Draw Pile immediately after playing any Basic Universe card. Discard if duplicate.
One per deck.

name: Morlock Tunnels - Hidden World
effect:
Morlock Tunnels' team may play numerical attacks face down for remainder of battle. Opponent must guess defense.
One per deck.

name: Muir Island - Genetic Research
effect:
For remainder of game, Muir Island's team may draw 1 card from top of Draw Pile immediately after blocking an attack using an Intellect Power card. Discard if duplicate.
One per deck.

name: Multiple Man
effect: May make one or both follow up attacks to any Universe: Teamwork card.

name: Multiple Man - Duplicate Self
effect: Play during battle. For remainder of battle, any attack made on Multiple Man may be moved to Duplicate Self. Multiple Man's team may not defend. Duplicate Self is KO'd with 1 Hit.

name: Multiple Man - Legacy Survivor
effect:
Remove all Hits from Multiple Man's Permanent Record and Current Battle, and switch Places with Reserve.
One per deck.

name: Multiple Man - Multiply and Conquer
effect:
Discard 1 Strength Power card usable by Multiple Man. Show Opponent up to 5 cards usable by Multiple Man from Hand. Draw equal number from Draw Pile. Discard duplicates.
One per deck.

name: Multiple Man - Outnumber
effect: Acts as a level 3 Fighting attack. If successful, Target Character may not make any follow up attacks from Teamwork or Special cards for remainder of battle.

name: Multiple Man - Team Madrox
effect: Play with any Power card attack. Multiple Man may make as many additional Fighting or Strength Power card attacks as possible. Opponent may defend.

name: Onslaught's Citadel - Electromagnetic Pulse
effect: Add 4 to Onslaught's Citadel's team's Venture Total, or Opponent is -4 to Venture Total for this battle.

name: Phoenix
effect: When KO'd, Phoenix may continue to fight and is not discarded until end of battle.

name: Phoenix - Askani Founder
effect:
Avoid 1 attack. May not be attacked for remainder of battle.
One per deck.

name: Phoenix - Child of the Future
effect:
Opponent must reveal Hand and play open handed for remainder of battle.
One per deck.

name: Phoenix - Manifest Phoenix
effect:
Acts as a level 11 Energy, Strength, or Intellect attack. Phoenix's team may not attack for remainder of battle.
One per deck.

name: Phoenix - Mutant Hound
effect: Play on Target Character as an attack. Attacks made on Target Character, including "Mutant Hound," may not be moved to any of Target's teammates for remainder of game.

name: Phoenix - Telepathic Power
effect: Acts as a level 7 Fighting attack.

name: Polaris
effect: May attack with Energy Power cards while in Reserve.

name: Polaris - Energy Warp
effect: Acts as a level 4 Energy attack. If successful, move all Hits from Polaris's Hits from Current Battle into Permanent Record. Affects Venture Total.

name: Polaris - Ensnare
effect:
Target Character may not attack or play Special cards for remainder of battle.
One per deck.

name: Polaris - Magnetic Field
effect: Acts as a level 5 Fighting attack. Attack may not be defended with a Special card.

name: Polaris - Manipulate Magnetism
effect: Avoids all attacks from 1 Teamwork card, or Target Character must discard 1 Placed Teamwork card.

name: Polaris - Reverse Polarity
effect: Acts as a level 2 Energy attack. If successful, acts as a level 8 Fighting Hit. Hit goes on Target Character's Permanent Record. Does not count for Venture Total.

name: Princess Bar
effect:
Chars: Wolverine, Shadowcat, Sabretooth, The Hand, Silver Samurai, Viper

Ability: Princess Bar Team's Energy Power cards are +2 to defense.

name: Princess Bar - Identity Swap
effect: Switch entire Permanent Record of any of The Princess Bar's Front Line Characters with Permanent Record of any Front Line teammate.

name: Psylocke Betsy Braddock
effect: Psylocke's Basic Universe cards count toward Damage and Venture Total.

name: Rapture
effect: +1 to all attacks vs. Characters with Intellect Power Grid 7 or 8.

name: Rapture - Avian Mutation
effect: Rapture may have 1 additional Special card Placed on her until KO'd. May not be duplicate.

name: Rapture - Flightpath
effect: Avoid 1 attack made with a Power card. Rapture may draw 1 card from the top of the Draw Pile. Discard duplicates.

name: Rapture - Mercy Killing
effect:
Acts as a level 5 Strength attack. If successful and Target has Hits totaling 15 or more, then Target is KO'd regardless of Inherent Abilities and other Special cards.
One per deck.

name: Rapture - Psychic Sword
effect: Acts as a level 0 Fighting or Strength attack. May only be defended by a Special card.

name: Rapture - Release Soul
effect: Acts as a level 2 Fighting attack. If successful, acts as a level 8 Intellect Hit. Hit goes on Target Character's Permanent Record. Does not count for Venture Total.

name: Reyes - Triage
effect: Avoid 1 attack made with a Power card or remove 1 Power card Hit from Reyes or teammate.

name: Rogue Brotherhood of Evil Mutants
effect: May not be Cumulative KO'd with Special cards.

name: Sabra - Bladefire
effect:
Acts as a level 9 Energy or Fighting attack.
One per deck.

name: Sabra - High Durability
effect:
Sabra may not be Cumulative KO'd for remainder of game.
One per deck.

name: Sabra - Lethal Agent
effect:
Acts as a level 5 Energy attack. If successful and Target has Hits totaling 15 or more, then Target is KO'd regardless of Inherent Abilities and other Special cards.
One per deck.

name: Sabra - Mossad
effect: Acts as a level 5 Intellect attack. If successful, Target Character may not play Activator cards for remainder of battle.

name: Sabra - Mutant Musculature
effect: Acts as a level 5 Strength attack. May make 1 additional Strength attack.

name: Shadow King - Astral Lifeform
effect: Acts as a level 6 Intellect attack. If successful, Target Character must discard 2 cards of Opponent's choice. Cards may be Placed or in Hand.

name: Shadow King - Possess Others
effect:
Target teammate may play any Shadow King Special cards for remainder of game.
One per deck.

name: Shadow King - Psi-Screen
effect: Avoid 1 attack made with a Special card. Shadow King may draw 1 card from the top of the Draw Pile. Discard duplicates.

name: Shadow King - Telepathic Manipulator
effect: Acts as a level 0 Fighting attack. May only be defended using a Power card with a Value of 5 or greater.

name: Shadow King - Twist Desire
effect:
Play during Battle. Both players move all Mission cards to Reserve Missions Pile. Mission cards Ventured this battle are now Ventured from Reserve Missions Pile.
One per deck.

name: Ship - Celestial Origin
effect:
For remainder of game, Ship's team may use Intellect Power cards to remove 1 Hit from the Permanent Record of any Front Line Character.
One per deck.

name: Spider-Girl
effect: Attacks made with Power cards may not be defended using Activator cards.

name: Spider-Girl - Clever Fighter
effect: Play with any Power card usable by Spider-Girl. For remainder of game, Spider-Girl does not have to discard duplicates of chosen Power card's Power Type and Value.

name: Spider-Girl - Mayday
effect:
For remainder of game, cards on Spider-Girl's Hits to Current Battle with Strength or Intellect icons do not count towards Opponent's Venture Total.
One per deck.

name: Spider-Girl - Spider Mobility
effect: Spider-Girl or teammate may avoid 1 attack of 9 or less.

name: Spider-Girl - Wall Walker
effect:
Teammate may not be attacked for remainder of battle.
One per deck.

name: Spider-Girl - Web Action
effect: Acts as a level 5 Strength attack. If successful, Target Character loses Inherent Ability and is considered to have no Inherent Ability for remainder of battle.

name: Storm Neutralized
effect: May play any "Morlocks" non-One-Per-Deck Special cards.

name: Sunfire
effect: May play "Solar Flare" from Reserve.

name: Sunfire - Atomic Flame
effect:
Acts as a level 9 Energy, Fighting, Strength, or Intellect attack. Sunfire may not attack for remainder of battle.
One per deck.

name: Sunfire - Ionize Matter
effect: Acts as a level 4 Energy or Fighting attack. Attack not affected by Special cards already in play.

name: Sunfire - Nationalist Zeal
effect: Sunfire is +2 to defense for remainder of battle.

name: Sunfire - Radiate Heat
effect:
Target Character must discard 1 Placed card. If successful, Opponent must discard 1 card from Hand for each Hit on Sunfire's Permanent Record.
One per deck.

name: Sunfire - Solar Flare
effect: Acts as a level 3 Fighting attack. If not successful, Opponent is -1 to Venture.

name: Taskmaster
effect: May use Intellect Power cards to avoid any Fighting attack.

name: Taskmaster - Photographic Reflexes
effect:
Play during battle. Taskmaster may exchange this card for any 1 Special card in Dead Pile not playable by Taskmaster and play it immediately.
One per deck.

name: Taskmaster - Replica Shield
effect: Taskmaster may Place and play Captain America's "Ricochet Shield", "Stars and Stripes", and "Mighty Shield" Special cards for remainder of game.

name: Taskmaster - Spy Camera
effect:
Look at top 8 cards of Draw Pile and choose any 4 cards. Reshuffle Draw Pile. Put four chosen cards on top of Draw Pile.
One per deck.

name: Taskmaster - Trained Lackeys
effect: Play during battle. For remainder of battle, any attack made on Taskmaster may be moved to Trained Lackeys. Taskmaster's team may not defend. Trained Lackeys are KO'd with 1 hit.

name: Taskmaster - Weapons Master
effect: Acts as a level 4 Fighting or Intellect attack. Attack not affected by Special cards already in play.

name: The Acolytes - Amelia Voght
effect: Target Character must make as many attacks as possible. Acolytes' team may defend.

name: The Danger Room - Holographic Attackers
effect:
For remainder of game, The Danger Room team's attacks made with Power cards may not be defended by Opponent's team's Special cards already in play.
One per deck.

name: The Hellfire Club - Von Roehm
effect:
Acts as a level 6 Any-Power attack. If successful, Target Character is KO'd by next level 2 Strength Power card Hit, regardless of Inherent Abilities and other Special cards.
One per deck.

name: The Marauders - Prism
effect: Acts as a level 7 Strength attack. If successful, acts as a level 3 Energy Hit. Hit goes on Permanent Record. Does not count towards Venture Total.

name: The Morlocks - Run from Slaughter
effect: Remove 1 Hit from Morlocks' or teammate's Permanent Record or Hits from Current Battle.

name: The Outback - Pirate Technology
effect: The Outback's team's Basic Universe cards used to attack count toward Damage and Venture Total for remainder of game.

name: The Reavers - Cybernetic Rebirth
effect: Play during battle. In the battle that Reavers are KO'd, Reavers may continue to fight and are not discarded until the end of the battle.

name: The Shi'ar - Fang
effect: Acts as a level 5 Strength attack. Attack may not be defended with a Special card.

name: The Siege Perilous
effect: Teammate may discard 3 cards from top of Draw Pile to Dead Pile after Draw Phase, before Events are played, each battle to remove any Hit from Permanent Record.

name: The Starjammers - Majestrix Lilandra
effect: Acts as a level 2 Intellect attack. If successful, acts as a level 8 Intellect Hit. Hit goes on Target Character's Permanent Record. Does not count for Venture Total.

name: Thunderbird - Apache Warrior
effect: Acts as a level 3 Fighting attack. If attack is defended, Thunderbird may draw 1 card from top of Draw Pile. Discard duplicates.

name: Thunderbird - Cellular Density
effect: Acts as a level 2 Strength attack. If successful, remove all Strength Power card Hits from Thunderbird and teammate's Permanent Record and Hits from Current Battle.

name: Thunderbird - Keen Senses
effect: Avoid 1 attack with a Fighting icon. Thunderbird may draw 1 card from the top of the Draw Pile. Discard duplicates.

name: Thunderbird - Powerhouse
effect: Acts as a level 5 Energy attack. Attack may not be defended with a Special card.

name: Thunderbird - Ultimate Sacrifice
effect:
Move any 1 Hit from Teammate to Thunderbird. Repeat until Thunderbird is KO'd or all Hits are on Thunderbird. Does not affect Venture Total. May be played from Reserve.
One per deck.

name: Trish Tilby
effect: Teammate must play 1 Special card.

name: Typhoid Mary
effect: Attacks made with Fighting Power cards may not be moved or shifted from Target Character.

name: Typhoid Mary - Assassinate
effect: Acts as a level 2 Fighting attack. If successful, attacks made on Target Character may not be moved to any of Target's teammates for remainder of game.

name: Typhoid Mary - Bloody Mary
effect:
Play when Opponent concedes battle. Opponent may not concede battle.
One per deck.

name: Typhoid Mary - Dressed to Kill
effect:
Acts as a level 9 Fighting or Intellect attack.
One per deck.

name: Typhoid Mary - Fractured Personality
effect: Acts as a level 5 Intellect attack. Attack may not be defended with a Special card.

name: Typhoid Mary - Sociopath
effect: Acts as a level 0 Intellect attack. May only be defended using a Power card with a Value of 5 or greater.

name: Wundagore Mountain - The Knights of Wundagore
effect: Acts as a level 7 Any-Power card. May be used to attack or defend. May not be combined with Universe cards.

name: X-Babies - Li'l Phoenix
effect: Acts as a level 7 Any-Power card. May be used to attack or defend. May not be combined with Universe cards.

name: X-Man - Apocalyptic Survival
effect: Acts as a level 4 Energy, Fighting, Strength, or Intellect attack. May make 1 additional attack.

name: X-Man - Illusory Reality
effect:
Avoid 1 attack. May not be attacked for remainder of battle.
One per deck.

name: X-Man - Sinister Creation
effect: X-Man's Hits to KO is reduced by 5 points and Energy Power cards are +3 for remainder of battle.

name: X-Man - Street Prophet
effect: Avoid 1 attack made with a Power card or remove 1 Power card Hit from X-Man or teammate.

name: X-Man - Ultimate Potential
effect:
Acts as a level 11 Energy, Fighting, or Strength attack. X-Man's team may not attack for remainder of battle.
One per deck.

name: X-Mansion - Mutant Schooling
effect:
For remainder of game, X-Mansion's team may draw 1 card from top of Draw Pile immediately after playing any Tactic: Doubleshot cards. Discard if duplicate.
One per deck.

name: X-Men Original Team
effect: May play any "Professor X" One-Per-Deck Special cards.

name: X-Men Original Team - Angel
effect: Teammate may avoid 1 attack.

name: X-Men Original Team - Beast
effect: Acts as a level 5 Strength attack. If successful, Target Character may not play Activator cards for remainder of battle.

name: X-Men Original Team - Cyclops
effect: Acts as a level 5 Energy or Fighting attack. May not be defended by a card from a Battlesite.

name: X-Men Original Team - Iceman
effect: Acts as a level 3 Strength attack. If not successful, Opponent is -1 to Venture.

name: X-Men Original Team - Marvel Girl
effect:
Play on your turn to concede battle. X-Men: Original Team's Mission cards return to pile Ventured from. Opponent's Mission cards advance as normal.
One per deck.

name: X-World
effect:
Chars: Havok, Goblyn Queen, Iceman, Beast, Angel, Storm

Ability: X-World's Power card attacks are not affected by Special cards already in play.

name: X-World - Parallel Dimension
effect:
Play during battle to exchange any of X-World's Front Line Characters with KO'd teammate. Discard all Hits to Permanent Record and Placed cards.
One per deck.

name: Xaos
effect: Draw 1 card when Xaos' teammate is KO'd.

name: Xaos - Autistic Withdrawal
effect: Target Character must make as many attacks as possible. Xaos' team may defend.

name: Xaos - Chaos Burst
effect: Acts as a level 5 Strength attack. If successful, Opponent must discard all Activator cards from Hand.

name: Xaos - Fractal Plasma
effect: Acts as a level 5 Energy attack. May make 1 additional Energy attack.

name: Xaos - Protective Instinct
effect: Xaos or teammate may avoid 1 attack of 9 or less.

name: Xaos - The Evil Eye
effect: Acts as a level 4 Energy, Fighting, or Strength attack. May be used against Character in Reserve, who may defend.
